name: Keep The Sheep
description:
A simple game where someone (probably French) has released your sheep from their pen! Your objective is to use your farmer and dog to herd the sheep that have escaped back into the pen.

Tip:

Farmer Shooting and Dog Barking creates sounds which assist in herding sheep from further away.

Controls:

GamePad (Xbox Controller):

  • Left Analog Stick - Controls Farmer
  • Left Trigger - Shoots Farmers Gun
  • Right Analog Stick - Controls Dog
  • Right Trigger - Dog Barks

Keyboard:

  • WASD - Controls Farmer
  • Space - Shoots Farmers Gun
  • Arrows - Controls Dog
  • Right Control - Dog Barks
